fields.label: Title
fields.name: general_title
fields.instructions:
Show or hide the title of this page/post.
Note: The default options are placed in Customizer > Utility > Title.

fields.label: Breadcrumb
fields.name: general_breadcrumb
fields.instructions:
Show or hide the breadcrumb of this page/post.
Note: The default options are placed in Customizer > Utility > Breadcrumbs.

fields.label: Body Offset
fields.name: general_body_offset
fields.instructions: Create a left or right spacing to the content, best use case when creating a lateral header to eliminate the FOUC effect.

fields.label: Padding Left
fields.name: general_body_offset_padding_left
fields.instructions:
Enter the Padding Left offset.
Note: Do not forget to enter the unit too.

fields.label: Padding Right
fields.name: general_body_offset_padding_right
fields.instructions:
Enter the Padding Right offset.
Note: Do not forget to enter the unit too.

fields.label: Offset Breakpoint
fields.name: general_body_offset_breakpoint
fields.instructions: Select from which device you want to remove the offset.

fields.label: Redirect
fields.name: general_redirect
fields.instructions: Make this post/page a redirect.

fields.label: Redirect URL
fields.name: general_redirect_url
fields.instructions: Enter the URL.

fields.label: Visibility
fields.name: header_visibility
fields.instructions:
Show or hide the classic header in your website, default is show.
Note: You'll still be able to place header templates.

fields.label: Type
fields.name: header_type
fields.instructions:
Select the type of header.
Note: The default option won't work if visibility is set to hide.

fields.label: Template
fields.name: header_template
fields.instructions:
Select the template.
Note: Do not forget to add headers in Elementor Templates.

fields.label: Skin
fields.name: header_skin
fields.instructions:
Select the header skin, light skin means white logo text and white hamburger.
Note: The default option is dark skin.

fields.label: Position
fields.name: header_position
fields.instructions:
Select the header position, the absolute header will push the content to the top of the page
Note: The default option is static.

fields.label: Transparency
fields.name: header_transparency
fields.instructions:
Select the header transparency, sticky will stay fixed in the scroll option.
Note: The default option is normal.

fields.label: Template
fields.name: header_sticky_template
fields.instructions: Select the header template that will be used as sticky.

fields.label: Autohide
fields.name: header_autohide
fields.instructions:
Switch on if you want to activate the autohide header. The header will be hidden when scrolling down, it will appear only when the user scrolls up, the option is valid only when Sticky is selected as transparency.
Note: The default option is on, when sticky is selected.

fields.label: Container
fields.name: header_container
fields.instructions:
Select if you want to use container holder for the header if disable is selected the header will push into left and right.
Note: The default option is on.

fields.label: Dark
fields.name: header_dark_logo
fields.instructions:
Upload your logo, will be used as a dark logo.
Note: In case the skin is selected Light, this logo will not be visible in default transparency.

fields.label: Light
fields.name: header_light_logo
fields.instructions: Upload your light logo, will be used as white logo in light skin.

fields.label: Width
fields.name: header_logo_width
fields.instructions:
Enter the number that will change the logo image width.
Note: Enter only the number without {px}.

fields.label: Height
fields.name: header_logo_height
fields.instructions:
Enter the number that will change the logo image height.
Note: Enter only the number without {px}.

fields.label: Top Header
fields.name: top_header_visibility
fields.instructions:
Select the visibility of the top header.
Note: The default option is hide.

fields.label: Search
fields.name: header_search_visibility
fields.instructions:
Select the visibility of the search.
Note: The default option is show.

fields.label: Sliding Bar
fields.name: sliding_bar_visibility
fields.instructions:
Select the visibility of the sliding bar.
Note: The default option is hide.

fields.label: Shopping Cart
fields.name: shopping_cart_visibility
fields.instructions:
Select the visibility of the shopping cart.
Note: The default option is show.

fields.label: Type
fields.name: footer_type
fields.instructions:
Select the footer type.
Note: Make sure to create templates with Elementor as footer type.

fields.label: Template
fields.name: footer_template
fields.instructions: Select the footer template.

fields.label: Skin
fields.name: footer_skin
fields.instructions:
Select the footer skin, if dark is selected the background will be dark and elements and vice versa.
Note: The default option is dark.

fields.label: Container
fields.name: footer_container
fields.instructions:
Select if you want to use container holder for the footer if off is selected the footer will push into left and right.
Note: The default option is on.

fields.label: Widgets
fields.name: footer_widgets
fields.instructions:
Switch on if you want to show the widgets on the footer.
Note: The default option is on.

fields.label: Columns
fields.name: footer_widgets_columns
fields.instructions:
Select the columns of widgets.
Note: The default option is 4 columns.

fields.label: Mobile Visibility
fields.name: footer_widgets_mobile_visibility
fields.instructions:
Select the visibility of the widgets in mobile layout mode (< 768px).
Note: The default option is visible.

fields.label: Visibility
fields.name: footer_copyright_visibility
fields.instructions:
Show or hide the copyright, by hiding the copyright the social media will be hidden too.
Note: The default option is show.

fields.label: Alignment
fields.name: footer_copyright_alignment
fields.instructions:
Select the alignment of copyright, if selected left the social media will be placed on the right and vice versa.
Note: The default option is left.

fields.label: Visibility
fields.name: footer_social_media_visibility
fields.instructions:
Show or hide the social media in the footer.
Note: The default option is show.

fields.label: Type
fields.name: portfolio_item_type
fields.instructions: Select the type of portfolio item.

fields.label: Subtitle
fields.name: portfolio_item_subtitle
fields.instructions: Enter the subtitle of portfolio item.
fields.placeholder: Hey there! I am a subtitle.

fields.label: Description Sticky
fields.name: side_portfolio_description_sticky
fields.instructions: Make the portfolio content fixed when scrolling.

fields.label: Description Alignment
fields.name: side_portfolio_description_alignment
fields.instructions: Select the alignment of description.

fields.label: Description Width
fields.name: side_portfolio_description_width
fields.instructions: Select the width of description.

fields.label: Description Place
fields.name: vertical_portfolio_description_place
fields.instructions: Select the place of description, the default is above the gallery.

fields.label: Description Width
fields.name: vertical_portfolio_description_width
fields.instructions: Select the width of description.

fields.label: Elementor
fields.message: Make sure to enable Elementor for the post type Portfolio in Elementor Settings.

fields.label: Visibility
fields.name: portfolio_item_navigation_visibility
fields.instructions:
Show or hide the navigation on portfolio item.
Note: The default option is show.

fields.label: Category
fields.name: portfolio_item_navigation_category
fields.instructions:
Enable if you want the posts to be navigated only in the same category.
Note: The default option is disable.

fields.label: Columns
fields.name: portfolio_item_gallery_columns
fields.instructions:
Select the columns of the portfolio item gallery.
Note: The default option is one column.

fields.label: Animation
fields.name: portfolio_item_gallery_animation
fields.instructions:
Select initial loading animation for the gallery.
Note: The default option is fade in.

fields.label: Gallery
fields.name: portfolio_item_gallery
fields.instructions: Add gallery items.

fields.label: Custom Tabs
fields.name: portfolio_item_custom_tabs
fields.instructions: Add custom tabs to your project item.

sub_fields.label: Type
sub_fields.name: portfolio_item_custom_tabs_type
sub_fields.instructions: Select if you want to show plain description or link.

sub_fields.label: Link Title
sub_fields.name: portfolio_item_custom_tabs_link_title
sub_fields.instructions: Enter the name of link, incase you don't write any title, the url will be used as title.

sub_fields.label: Link Url
sub_fields.name: portfolio_item_custom_tabs_link_url
sub_fields.instructions: Enter the name of the link, in case you don't write any title, the url will be used as the title.

sub_fields.label: Link Target
sub_fields.name: portfolio_item_custom_tabs_link_target
sub_fields.instructions: Tick if you want the link to be opened in a new tab.

fields.label: Visibility
fields.name: hero_visibility
fields.instructions:
Show or hide the hero.
Note: The default option is show.

fields.label: Height
fields.name: hero_height
fields.instructions: Inherit the value of height from Theme Options or set it custom.

fields.label: Custom Height
fields.name: hero_custom_height
fields.instructions:
Enter the height with units.
Note: Do not forget to add the unit too, for example px/vh/rem/em/%.

fields.label: Container
fields.name: hero_container
fields.instructions:
Select if you want the hero to be boxed in 1140px width or not.
Note: The default option is on.

fields.label: Image
fields.name: hero_image
fields.instructions:
Select the image you want to display as hero background image.
Note: The default option is no image.

fields.label: Custom Image
fields.name: hero_custom_image
fields.instructions: Select the custom image you want to display as hero background image.

fields.label: Repeat
fields.name: hero_image_repeat
fields.instructions:
Select the image repeat settings.
Note: The default option is no repeat.

fields.label: Attachment
fields.name: hero_image_attachment
fields.instructions:
Select the image attachment settings.
Note: The default option is scroll.

fields.label: Position
fields.name: hero_image_position
fields.instructions:
Select the image position settings.
Note: The default option is center center.

fields.label: Size
fields.name: hero_image_size
fields.instructions:
Select the image size settings.
Note: The default option is cover.

fields.label: Overlay
fields.name: hero_image_overlay
fields.instructions:
Show an overlay for the background image.
Note: The default option is hide.

fields.label: Overlay Opacity
fields.name: hero_image_overlay_opacity
fields.instructions: Enter the number of overlay opacity, the number can be in range of 0 and 1.

fields.label: Overlay Color
fields.name: hero_image_overlay_color
fields.instructions: Select the color of overlay.

fields.label: Alignment
fields.name: hero_alignment
fields.instructions:
Select the text alignment of the hero.
Note: The default option is left.

fields.label: Title
fields.name: hero_title
fields.instructions:
Select the title you want to display in the hero.
Note: The default option is use this post/page title.

fields.label: Custom Title
fields.name: hero_custom_title
fields.instructions: Enter the title, it accepts html tags too.

fields.label: Animation
fields.name: hero_title_animation
fields.instructions:
Select initial loading animation for the title.
Note: The default option in Fade In.

fields.label: Color
fields.name: hero_title_color
fields.instructions:
Select the color of title.
Note: The default option in #232931.

fields.label: Custom Color
fields.name: hero_title_color_custom
fields.instructions: Select the custom color from the picker.

fields.label: Breadcrumb
fields.name: hero_breadcrumb
fields.instructions: Show the breadcrumb on hero.

fields.label: Navigation
fields.name: product_navigation
fields.instructions:
Select the visibility of the navigation.
Note: The default option is show.

fields.label: Alignment
fields.name: product_gallery_alignment
fields.instructions:
Select the alignment of the gallery, if left is selected the content will move right and vice versa.
Note: The default option is left.

fields.label: Width
fields.name: product_gallery_width
fields.instructions:
Select the width of the gallery.
Note: The default option is one half (1/2).

fields.label: Visibility
fields.name: product_related_visibility
fields.instructions:
Select the visibility of the related products.
Note: The default option is show.

fields.label: Number
fields.name: product_related_count
fields.instructions:
Select how many products you want to display in the related section.
<small>Note: The default option is 4 products</small>

fields.label: Thumbnail
fields.name: blog_post_thumbnail
fields.instructions:
Show or hide the thumbnail on post.
Note: The default option is show.

fields.label: Navigation Visibility
fields.name: blog_post_navigation_visibility
fields.instructions:
Show or hide the navigation on post.
Note: The default option is show.

fields.label: Navigation Category
fields.name: blog_post_navigation_category
fields.instructions:
Enable if you want the posts to be navigated only in the same category.
Note: The default option is disable.

fields.label: Share
fields.name: blog_post_share
fields.instructions:
Select the visibility of share icons.
Note: The default option is show.

fields.label: Sidebar
fields.name: blog_post_sidebar
fields.instructions:
Select the placement of sidebar or hide it.
Note: The default option is right.
